page.title: 04Trains,buses and cars.
page.content: There is a small railway station at St.Columb Road. Trains go on to the end of the line at Newquay or back to Par which is the junction where the main line trains from London to Penzance stop.In the winter there are not many trains each day.There are more in the summer when the tourists come. There are bus services from Truro to Newquay and Newquay to St.Austell.Not many people use them because they cost too much.On Wednesdays and Saturdays lots of people go shopping in Truro where there are big shops.They use Harris'Coaches because it is much cheaper. Most families have their own car because without one it would be very hard to get anywhere from Indian Queens.
